message: Fair and simple, let's split it 50/50!
You started with 50, I'm willing to give you less, but I want more for myself
I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I still want a fair share
You gave me less than 50, I'm willing to give you more, but I'm not getting taken advantage of
I'm really struggling to make ends meet, can you please help me out?
I'm not going to give you a handout, but I'll give you a slightly better deal
